attributes.action: TELL US how much fraud on a taxpayer funded credit card by members of NICE constitutes a crime.
attributes.additional_details: It is reported, through FOI requests that members of NICE have made purchases which cannot be reconciled with them being related to what NICE does.  How far are our politicians prepared to go to protect the thieves on NICE from being prosecuted because to prosecute them would confirm the appalling lack of judgement in appointing the criminals to the job in the first place.
